Class GameTurnState

java.lang.Object
parade.gameStates.GameState
parade.gameStates.GamePlayStates.GamePlayState
parade.gameStates.GamePlayStates.GameTurnStates.GameTurnState
Direct Known Subclasses:
FinalRoundTurnState, NotFinalRoundTurnState
public abstract class GameTurnState extends GamePlayState
Abstract class for handling turn-based gameplay logic during normal and final rounds.

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      protected void playTurn(Player current)
      Executes a single turn for the given player, including input handling and card playing.
      Parameters:
      current - The player taking the turn.

    • playCard

      protected void playCard(Player current, int index) throws InvalidCardException
      Plays the selected card from the player's hand and updates all relevant game state.
      Parameters:
      current - The player playing the card.
      index - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - If the card cannot be legally played.

    • getTurnSelection

      protected TurnSelection getTurnSelection(Player current) throws SelectionException
      Processes and returns the next user selection input for the current player.
      Parameters:
      current - The player whose input is being processed.
      Returns:
      A TurnSelection representing the selected action or card.
      Throws:
      SelectionException - If input is invalid or cannot be converted to a valid selection.
